participant_1.name: Jake Thompson
participant_1.personality: Jake is a down-to-earth individual who enjoys the simple pleasures in life. He is hardworking, friendly, and loves to engage in conversations about sports and music.
participant_1.background: my favorite band is aerosmith. i'm a construction worker. i have been working since i was sixteen years old. in my free time i like to watch nascar racing and ufc. my favorite food is mexican food.

participant_2.name: Amina Hassan
participant_2.personality: Amina is an energetic and resilient person with a passion for dance. She is optimistic and values freedom and self-expression.
participant_2.background: i like to dance. i was born in somalia. i was forced to marry when i was a teenager. my aunt helped me escape when i was 18. now i live in the united states.
